Interface_name: TCP Client - side by using socket in python
Instruction:
Task Description: Create a thread-safe TCP socket wrapper class that handles connection management, data transmission, and SSL/TLS encryption with proper resource cleanup.

Class Description: SafeStreamSocket is a robust socket wrapper that provides safe connection handling, unique socket identification, and SSL/TLS capabilities. It manages socket lifecycle including proper cleanup and supports both IPv4 and Unix domain sockets.

Attributes:
_id: [int] - Unique identifier for the socket instance
_dup_sock: [socket.socket] - Duplicate socket used during SSL/TLS handshake
_name: [str] - Optional name identifier for the socket
_sock: [socket.socket] - Main socket connection object
_finalizer: [weakref.finalize] - Weak reference finalizer for cleanup
_id_numbers: [class attribute, list[int]] - Tracks all active socket IDs
_n: [class attribute, list[int]] - Counter for generating unique IDs

Methods:
__init__: [constructor](addr: Union[str, Tuple[str, int], socket.socket, Any]) -> None - Initializes socket connection with the given address
_acquire_uid: [_acquire_uid]() -> int - Generates a unique ID for the socket instance
_connect: [_connect](addr: Union[str, Tuple[str, int], socket.socket, Any]) -> socket.socket - Establishes connection to the specified address
_cleanup: [_cleanup]() -> None - Performs cleanup operations when socket is closed
_release_uid: [_release_uid](id: int) -> None - Releases the socket ID when closed
close: [close]() -> None - Closes the socket connection
closed: [property]() -> bool - Returns whether socket is closed
id: [property]() -> int - Returns socket ID
name: [property]() -> str - Gets socket name
name: [setter](new_name: str) -> None - Sets socket name
get_socket: [get_socket]() -> socket.socket - Returns underlying socket object
recv: [recv](bufsize: int = 4096) -> bytes - Receives data from socket
recvall: [recvall](size: int) -> bytearray - Receives exact amount of data
sendall: [sendall](data: Union[bytes, bytearray]) -> int - Sends all data through socket
switch_to_ssl: [switch_to_ssl](pemfile: str) -> None - Upgrades connection to SSL/TLS
__enter__: [__enter__]() -> SafeStreamSocket - Context manager entry
__exit__: [__exit__](*args) -> None - Context manager exit
